modName: No Panties version For Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT - DELETED
summary:
this is not a mod its just the bodyslide files without panties.
<br />I made this for personal use but i thougth i would just upload it because why not.
descriptionHtml:
this is not a mod its just the bodyslide files without panties.

How to install:
1. You have to download the files.
2. Open up your Skyrim directory Probably located at C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim .
3. Open up Data, then Caliente Tools then BodySlide and under that u have to open SliderSets
4. Copy and Paste the files you downloaded into the folder.
5. Open up BodySlide Use (or make) your body and then click build and after that click batch build.
6. Your DONE!
author: Bobjonhson
